meanings: stoppage, cessation, interruption, suspension, 두절하다 stop, cease, be interrupted, be paralyzed, be cut off, be blocked
be cut off; (교통 등이) be blocked (up), be paralyzed
be cut off from the outside world

vlive.korean: [연락두절] 답변이 없더라고요. [No contact] but there was no response. 듣기 View video Big Picture (빅픽처) : 빅픽처2 ep63_방송 인생 최대 위기 하하 먹튀(?)논란!?

vlive.korean: 데뷔하고 연락 두절됐다는 얘기가 있어요. I heard you stopped keeping in touch after the debut. 듣기 View video stellar : [STELLAR] 스텔라 COMEBACK
vlive.english: I heard you stopped keeping in touch after the debut.

examples.korean: The traffic was crippled for the day. 발음듣기 교통은 그날 하루 두절되었다. Friendict Level English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: The train schedule has been disrupted by the heavy snowfall. 발음듣기 심한 폭설로 기차 운행이 두절되었다 Dong-a's Prime English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The train schedule has been disrupted by the heavy snowfall. 발음
